attributes.action: Stop killing Rohinga People in Myanmar and make peace for the whole humanity!
attributes.additional_details: More than 1,000 Rohingya feared killed in Myanmar crackdown, say UN officials
attributes.background: Over 400,000 Rohingya refugees have fled to Bangladesh from Myanmar over the past few weeks, with numbers increasing every day. Violence in North Rakhine means that families are being forced to flee their homes and walk for days to find safety across the border.
